DEMO_421_MSG_010:
̂You're alive, Mister! What a relief... I was starting to
think you weren't going to snap out of it.
ā
DEMO_421_MSG_020: ̂What the heck happened in there? There was a huge explosion from inside the Bastille...
DEMO_421_MSG_030:
̂Oh no! Lucia... she didn't make it out!? What about Itaburu, and all the others!?
ā
DEMO_421_MSG_040:
̂This can't be... I wanted to talk to her again...
And thank her for what she did for me... -sniff-
DEMO_421_MSG_050:
̂This was lying on the floor near where we found you.
Do you think this was Lucia's Reactor... ?
ā
DEMO_421_MSG_060: ̂It is, then... I'm glad I grabbed it, then. I suppose you'll be hanging onto it...
DEMO_421_MSG_070: ̂W-W-What's it doing!? It looks like it's calling out to yours... !
